notes: Radio configuration notes RADIO SETTING - MODE PSK/DATA Menu:
Radio configuration notes OPERATION SETTING - GENERAL Menu:
• Select the following: ATT - OFF; IPO-IPO; DNF-OFF; AGC-SLOW
• Set RF GAIN/SQL knob full right
• Leave SHIFT; WIDTH; NOTCH; COUNTOUR all off.
• Exception - WIDTH can be adjusted for narrow bandwidth modes like VARA 500 to increase SNR
